original_title: Shooting kills another youth in Negombo
original_body_lines: A youth, who was injured in a shooting incident at Lellama in Negombo, succumbed to his injuries this afternoon while being treated at the Negombo Hospital, police said.
Two gunmen arrived on a motorbike opened fire at the youth in Lellama and fled the scene.
The youth who sustained serious injuries was admitted to the Negombo Hospital where he died this afternoon.
The victim is a 25-year-old youth a resident of the Pitipana area.
The motive for the killing is yet to be ascertained. Dungalpitiya police are investigating.
